channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. life expectancy is going up. Think how many more news quizzes you can do!
item.description: When the news gets too heavy, the quiz is forced to turn to pop culture questions — so there are a lot this week. Let's see how you do!

item.title: Trump thinks a weaker dollar is great for America. Is he right?
item.description: The president said this week that the value of the dollar is "great" despite a sharp tumble since last year. That may be true for certain parts of the...

item.title: Kalshi in court over 19 federal lawsuits. What's the future of prediction markets?

item.title: Kari Lake promotes Trump on Voice of America. Does that break the law?

item.title: Want to be part of a village? You might need to get out of your comfort zone

item.title: How Sequoia-backed Ethos reached the public market while rivals fell short
item.description: The profitable life-insurance platform was one of the first major tech companies to test the 2026 public markets.

item.title: Masked agents, face scans and a question: Are you a citizen? Inside Trump’s Minnesota crackdown
Fearing ICE, Native Americans rush to prove their right to belong in the US
Elon Musk’s SpaceX, Tesla, and xAI in talks to merge, according to reports
item.description: This merger would bring the Grok chatbot, Starlink satellites, and SpaceX rockets together under one corporation.

item.title: Trump’s border czar suggests a possible drawdown in Minnesota, but only after ‘cooperation’
item.description: President Donald Trump’s border czar says immigration enforcement could reduce the number of officers in Minnesota.

item.title: Guys, I don’t think Tim Cook knows how to monetize AI
item.description: One intrepid Morgan Stanley analyst dared to ask how Apple will make money on its AI investments. The answer will not shock you.

item.title: The “18-Year Real Estate Cycle” Ends in 2026 (What Now?)

item.title: Amazon is reportedly in talks to invest $50B in OpenAI
item.description: If a deal materializes, it would mean Amazon is backing competing startups in the race for AI supremacy.

item.title: The iPhone just had its best quarter ever
item.description: Growth in regions like China and India are credited with pushing Apple's phone sales higher than ever.
